author: ylavic
msg: mpm_{worker,prefork}: save some cycles by not copying the listener's pollfds
We don't need a copy when poll()ing if those are allocated with the correct
lifetime (the listener thread) at the very beginning.

author: shalin
msg: - Added langid.maxFieldValueChars and langid.maxTotalChars params to limit
input, by default 10k and 20k chars, respectively.
- Moved input concatenation to Tika implementation; the langdetect
implementation instead appends each input piece via the langdetect API.

author: kwin
msg: SLING-4447 provide a SlingModels Sightly UseProvider which throws exceptions in case a Sling Model cannot be instantiated instead of falling back to the simple Pojo instantiation.
